name.zh: 儿童学生双肩书包（运动撞色，多颜色）

description.en: A kids school backpack with sporty contrast zippers and reflective-style trim. Features a roomy main compartment, organized inner space, mesh side pocket, and padded shoulder straps for comfort. OEM/ODM customization available for fabrics (including recycled options), colorways, logo patch, lining, pocket layout, and packaging.
description.zh: 儿童学生双肩书包，运动风撞色拉链与装饰条设计。主仓容量充足，内部收纳更有序，侧边网袋可放水杯，肩带加厚背负更舒适。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、配色、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构与包装等。

en: Outer: Polyester / Nylon (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Padding: Foam/EVA padding for straps & back panel (customizable)
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：涤纶/尼龙（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
撞色装饰：织带/包边（颜色可定制）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
背负：肩带/背部可加海绵/EVA 衬垫（可定制）

en.Compartments: Multiple zip pockets + 1 main compartment + internal sleeve (optional) + mesh side bottle pocket
en.Customization: Colors, fabric, logo, lining, pocket layout, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.收纳结构: 多拉链口袋 + 1 主仓 + 内部夹层（可选）+ 侧边网袋水杯位
zh.舒适背负: 肩带/背部可加厚衬垫（可定制）
zh.可定制: 配色、面料、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
